```python
from vpython import *

# Screen settings
scene.width = 700
scene.height = 400

# Constants
g = 9.81  # acceleration due to gravity
dt = 0.01  # time step
initial_height = 5  # initial height of the ball

# Objects
ground = box(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), size=vector(20, 0.1, 10), color=color.green)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, initial_height, 0), radius=0.5, color=color.red, make_trail=True)

# Initial conditions
ball.v = vector(1, 0, 0)  # initial horizontal velocity
ball.a = vector(0, -g, 0)  # acceleration due to gravity

# Animation loop
while True:
    rate(100)
    
    if ball.pos.y - ball.radius < ground.pos.y:  # collision with ground
        ball.v.y *= -1  # reverse vertical velocity

    ball.pos = ball.pos + ball.v * dt  # update position
    ball.v = ball.v + ball.a * dt  # update velocity
```
